articles.title: Show HN: Offline, GTP-Free Content Generator
articles.description: This is an offline, Windows content generator that doesn't use GPT or any GPT-like dependencies to create first drafts of different types of articles, reports, blog posts, etc. I introduced in it 2014 to help me complete my freelance writing work, and it's th…

articles.title: Monitoring Search traffic (and more!) with Data Studio
articles.description:
This article shows how to create a monitoring dashboard for your Search traffic on Data Studio. It also announces the addition of new data to
 the Search Console Data Studio connector, including data for Discover and Google News traffic.
articles.content:
